has research problem.from sentence: We propose a novel neural attention architecture to tackle machine comprehension tasks, such as answering Cloze-style queries with respect to a document.
We propose a novel neural attention architecture to tackle machine comprehension tasks, such as answering Cloze-style queries with respect to a document.
Cloze-style queries (Taylor, 1953) are created by deleting a particular word in a natural-language statement.
